captions.text: Hello everybody, my name is Markiplier and welcome to Grave
An Indie Horror game that promises dynamic environment spawning
and if dynamic environment spawning means procedurally generated
then I am very interested in this horror game
One thing I did notice as soon as I loaded up ,
that even though this is a desert of death and destruction, this looks awfully nice !
There´s a lot of detail put into this and I´ve been pretty lucky
because this week I´ve been able to play some actually high quality indie horror games
which there´s been a rather um... drought of
there´s been a lack of really high quality ones so I am eager to give this one a try
Was that me or was that a breathy breathy over here ?!
Oh, I think that's a thing!
Some little girl gonna pour out of that T.V
And talk to me about rings and such?
Oh they didn't even show what happened.
How many matches do I have?
The counter in the bottom says
So I guess I'm winning against the matches?!
okay... okay... The LSD is kicking in!
You all right?! You need match?!
I got matches! Can I jump?
Look I'm jumping like two inches off the ground.
Hey buddy! You want some matches?!
Maybe they might help with your breathing problem!
I guess I have an unlimited matches now.
Or maybe I just got a giant box of a thousand matches.
So either way I'm gonna to follow these rail road tracks.
Into this umm... mine looking thingy.
I don't know if this all randomly generated
or if this is just kind of the lay out here.
I didn't read the instructions very well.
Oh... It got dark real quick.
That's a pretty common theme with me
Because I am... Dumb... I am the dumb...
When they are given to me
So I actually have some light in here.
I wonder how long till they turn off.
Because that's a pretty common theme in these...
This is made on the unity engine by the way.
But I don't recall unity engine looking
I like the ominous glow of red of my match of the walls
Anyways! Enough harping of the game itself
You think you can mess with me?!
I've screamed in the face of thousands of horror monsters.
Best not to taunt the monster before I meet him
Cause I'm sure that there is one in here!
This would be a great lay out.
Like I love! I don't know if this is pesidrually generated
because it didn't say it was
It just said it was a dynamic environment spawning
Is one of my favorite games
Can I throw myself to my death?
I can't even jump over that ledge!
I'm like a body builder that only focused
So I got like gigantic titanic muscles
But on my legs are just little twigs
I need not be freaked out about that
That was just a little hole, in the ceiling there...
You stomping around in that mud over there
Aren't railroad tracks supposed to go somewhere?
Is this Wryly Coyote where he painted a...
People probably don't even know who Wryly Coyote is anymore
Is there a monster up there?
You're gonna get some matches up the butt! Ok Fine.
So I'm assuming they're waiting on it
Till I get to... Where I'm supposed to... What is it?
I'm probably scarier than anything in this c...
Did I just shatter my leg?
One of my twig legs just broke in half
And I kinda am limping now?
I don't like the smell of this
I don't like the claustrophobia of this
Oh ok, I was expecting that I was gonna be in the cave for a while
Unless this is just a red herring and I'm not really...
Which way was I supposed to go? Was that my first choice?
I keep going what is that and there's perfectly logical... answers
So what what whawa, what is happening?
I'm running as fast as I CAN!
THE SHADOW'S KEEPING UP WITH ME!
Is that a bad thing or is the sun just going down?
What is this thing? It's a C with a...
I... I don't know what's going on so you...
It looks like the belly button piercing on a...
If ya know what I mean
And now I'm going up to another tusky...
Sorry, I got freaked out for a second.
My expectation on these horror games are very low
So when they're delightful and look fantastic
And the environment is cool to like...
The dust ball is not a common theme in any horror game
Is that a can of gasoline
So I can burn this barn down to the ground?
They shouldn't have give me this
ARE THEY S... I CAN BURN THINGS!
I was really hoping for something there
Maybe if I soak the... Hya!
You can't just give me gasoline...
And not give me the option to burn everything I see!
Why did it get dark all of a sudden?
Those matches do not last long
On the ground they do not last long
But in my hand I can apparently hold them forever witho...
One of these things, is not like the other
One of these things just doesn't belong
Ooh ok, that somehow made it much worse
I suddenly got all these Vietnam flashbacks...
Do I get the gas can?
Uh... Maybe I climb up into the barn!
I'm very... Uh... Frazzled right now because I'm...
I'm at a lost for what to do!
Wait, maybe if I lead him over the fire I created there.
You know you want to step into the flames
Welp, that was the first death let's get back into it
Really I was doing it wrong
I don't recall anything hitting me
But I seem to have lost health
I wasn't watching my health metre down there
Wha, whe where is da gahh
I don't know if the gasoline really helped me but...
Ooh, it's one of those big battery flashlights
The one with the very gearthy uh... thingy on it
Oh ok, I thought there was like a body up there
Nobody wants to mess with me
Apparently that's not a thing I can do
But if someone wants to mess with me they're going to be awfully...
I think chuffed is the British word for exited
Everything in Britain it's so weird
I'm awfully chuffed to see this scenario
I'm going to go see what this big glowy thing was
No I need to find the gas first
The thing probably not gonna trigger until I find the gas
This is a load of ah, a load of bull!
Where the hell do I go to find it?
I'm going to go out and see what that thing is
If I can't find the gas out there then I'm just...
And why are you shaking the ground?
I seem to be getting the idea that these things
Don't like light but what is this thing?
It's like one of those gates
Er a ba ba ba ba bababba
It's one of those things from Mass Effect
You know what I'm talking about
Ok, I guess it's time for the monsters to come out and play
Don't worry, I've got a flash bang with your name on it
No, I've got a flash bang!
What the hell did that do?
Ahh the most useless thing I've ever seen
Oh, I don't think I was doing anything
Ooh, he's breathing all over me
I don't much care for it
There's another flash bang that don't do jack
Why am I shooting my thing like a gun?
Ooo, I guess I'll just take a break and watch some T...
I don't know but that thing's going crazy over there
A BUH BA BU BUH BA
YA BA BA BA BA BA
Well I don't know what I'm supposed to do?
It was just already doing that.
A BE BE BE BE BE
It didn't work on that other guy though
Suck on my light, suck my light!
My chuffness levels are at maximum
God I just hear the breathing
So what was up with the red guy?
Because the sun's coming up apparently
Or not because I don't have any gas
Was I supposed to pour gas in the generator...
And not on the ground like a moron?
I'm just an idiot that was like...
And I was supposed to put it into the thing
I didn't actually know that the sun moved through the sky like that but...
It's gotta be something to do with this
Oh great belly button ring of the Gods
Tell me what I must do!
And I shall probably do it...
Because there's another way to go out the cave
And I can't really find anything else here
NO LET ME LEAVE YOU BASTARD!
Welp, apparently I'm gonna be here a while
I CAN'T BE ALRIGHT WITH THIS!!
The big thompy thomp over there
The belly button ring of the Gods is gone
Why is this not hurting you?
So I'm going to have to make do with whatever I have else
And I don't think I even have gas
The one that isn't affected w...
A BA BA BA BA BA BA!
So come on, bring it on
A BA BA BA BA BA
I really am shooting this thing like a gun
It's almost hilarious if it wasnt ridiculous
That didn't do anything for me
Where can I get more batteries?
Or a gas can, that would be nice too
Hey you bitch, you wanna back up a tad?
I've got a flashlight, I'm armed and slightly
My chuffness levels you don't wanna mess with them
Don't look at me, I'm serious business bro!
I don't want to mess with the guy!
I don't think I want to mess with the guy anyway
Because I don't think I can kill the guy
I'm gonna mess with the guy!
Cause I've got nothing better to do
Huh, there's more than one guy!
Oh ok, that was a mistake
That was a bit of a mistake
I don't think a flash bang's gonna do much to them
Shut up I've got a match!
Beh! Beh! Beh! Beh! Beh! Beh!
Oh wait there's a thing over there!
No, is that the same place I'm just in?
Hang on, wait, no, ok get my flash...
That is, that is, that is something else
That might be the same exact...
Is this just looping back and forth forever?
Am I going to be trapped here for the rest of eternity?
Aww, I wanted to play more
I misunderstood it's not proceduraly generated I think
Not to shabby if I had to say so
But the gun shooty flashlight mechanic
They could work on that one
If you wanna play it for yourself
There's a link in the description
If you wanna see more horror videos that I've done
It's a giant playlist, like a 140 videos
And if you've got more suggestions for good
Horror games that you want me to play in the future
Let me know in the comments
I will see you... In the next video

comments.author: Ilya Kuryakin

comments.text:
A few months ago I started designing a desert based horror game SO similar 
to this called "Desolate" and you're stuck in a desert and slowly running 
out of water and you start getting progressively more horrifying 
hallucinations, but then I saw this video and just went STOOOOOOOOP! on the 
project...﻿
comments.author: Chinesepizzagames

comments.text:
+Chinesepizzagames 
You DEFINITELY shouldn't stop. You should always push yourself to your 
limit, if you don't, you won't ever know your own true potential. 
"Desolate" sounds like it would be an amazing game. :)
As Dory would say "Just keep swimming!"
comments.author: Sarah Conner

comments.text:
I also think you shouldn't stop. Your game could be great, I think the only 
real similarity is the location not that that really matters. 

I love the idea of the hallucinations coming from lack of hydration, that's 
really cool. I really like when games explain why the monsters are there 
instead of just them just randomly appearing with no explanation of how 
they came to be.
comments.author: ShinigamiQueen8

comments.text:
+Chinesepizzagames 
I would LOVE a game that is like Dark Sun ((a table top game)) Basically 
Dark Sun is basically fallout with REALLY scarce water and magic. Imagine 
fallout mixed with the world of Lord of the Rings and you have dark sun. 
But to extend, the sort of horror you face when you have no water and you 
can't escape really really really makes one... scared to put it simply. 
A mechanic I would think to add is finding small pools of water, when your 
hallucinations start to 'hurt' and you are literally crawling to the water 
trying to clear your head. But that might be too similar to games like 
Amnesia.
comments.author: Maria White

comments.text:
KEEP DOING IT. Seriously. Just do it. Don't let ONE vaguely similar game 
location stop you.

comments.text:
I'm not going to lie, I think this really has potential. Yeah, this is sort 
of a fucking-around-with-environment-and-mechanics thing right now, but I 
think it has the potential to become a really good horror game. I love 
desert/Old Western environments - I think they're a seriously underused 
setting for modern horror gaming.﻿

comments.author: FederationPilotLouis98

comments.text:
This was made in Unity > Only Unity Pro supports shadows and camera effects 
> Unity Pro is $1,500 > If every Indie game developer had this kind of 
budget, the games would look alot different.﻿
comments.author: Paul Phoenix

comments.text:
you also loose 10-15%ish to your distributor (steam ,app store, ect), then 
20% taxs, then you also have to pay for the programs like photoshop and 
maya used to make the game. $30,000 is the budget for a one man team with 6 
months at minimum wage with no marketing budget. if your game only made 
$30,000 it is generally considered a failure. We have to make at least 
$50,000 per person on our team at work, to make any profit off a game or we 
will go under. Then marketing and everything is on top of that. Unity is 
the cheapest good 3d game engine I know of. I haven't seen anything else 
that cheap come close.
comments.author: ZacVrono

comments.text:
how is a 5% royaltee fee expensive?
Cause as you said, it would take you to generate $30,000 to pay Unreal only 
$1,500. 
Don't know about you, but keeping $28,500 out of the original $30,000 is a 
fine deal for me.
Unless there are extra fees Unreal has that I don't know of.
comments.author: Niles 1093

comments.text:
Unity pro is SUPER cheap. also that is not necessarily true. none pro has 
shadows and camera effects, but in order to get the optimized ones and more 
of them by default you have to buy it, but you can just go program them 
yourself too.
unreal engine takes percentage of profits per game, so if you make $30,000 
from you game unreal is now as expensive and you have to pay that for each 
game. We wanted to use either unity or unreal at work for a project, but 
unreal was way to expensive, and unity doesn't support C++, so 
unfortunately we didn't.
comments.author: ZacVrono

P.S. Chuffed means 'pleased' with something.
e.g. 'I'm chuffed that I did well in my test!' is meant by, 'I'm pleased 
that I did well in my test!'
